extension_description.message: Let your Cisco phone dial a number by the click of a button right within your Google Contacts.
extension_description.description: Text that describes what this extension does

error_connection_failed.description: Error text if the connection to the phone failed

error_dial_failed.description: Error text if the phone returns an error code

options_saved.description: Message to show after settings have been saved

options_label_phone_address.description: Label for the phone address option

options_description_phone_address.message: IP address or hostname of your Cisco IP phone. You can also add the web server port if you use a port other then the default.
options_description_phone_address.description: Description for the phone address option

options_label_auth_config.description: Label for the auth config options

options_description_auth_config.message: Enter your username and password in case your phone requests it for authentication. Leave the fields blank otherwise.
options_description_auth_config.description: Description for the auth config options

options_placeholder_username.description: Label for the user name option

options_label_telephony_uri.description: Label for the telephony URI option

options_description_telephony_uri.message:
This URI will be executed on your phone to dial a number. The term {number} will be replaced by the number of the selected entry.
If you need a prefix to dial out you can also add it to the URI e.g. Dial:9{number} will always dial a 9 before the number.
options_description_telephony_uri.description: Description for the telephony URI option

options_description_country_code.message: Choose here in wich country you are living in. If you are located in a different country then your provider, choose his country.

options_label_context_menu.description: Label for the context menu option

options_label_inpage_dial.message: Activate detection of phone numbers on all websites (Beta)
options_label_inpage_dial.description: Label for the in page dial option
